name: Lost in the nebula
description:
Defend your cargo against alien entities,

Alien entities love to feed of your cargo crates and every time they ingest one they get bigger and badder.

if they feed enough they could match your ship and charge immediately .

The only way to defend your self is with the same tractor beam pulse that pulls your cargo closer.

Strategy is needed as further levels provide faster aliens, faster tractor beam pulse. More aliens and crates.

TIPS: 

  • Audio is very important is this game as you can hear the aliens approaching and also hear them feeding.
  • Try to time the pulses so you can destroy the enemies easily
  • Prioritise enemies  - as they grow stringer they'r colours change with last one being the pure red which at that point is pretty much over :)

Enjoy. Further updates to come when evaluation from the jam is over :).

Thank you for the jam.
